SELECT k.api_key_id AS apiKeyId, k.api_key AS apiKey, k.allowed_domains AS allowedDomains, k.enabled AS enabled, k.rate_limit_per_min AS rateLimitPerMin, k.expires_at AS expiresAt, k.created_at AS createdAt, k.client_id AS clientId,
c.status AS clientStatus, c.client_code AS clientCode, c.client_name AS clientName FROM lxp_api_key k JOIN lxp_api_client c ON k.client_id = c.client_id WHERE k.api_key = #{apiKey}
